episodes.title: Inside Chi Alpha: The Cult Tactics Hiding Behind Campus Ministry
episodes.description:
Chi Alpha Christian Fellowship claims to be a student ministry, but behind the worship nights and Bible studies lies a culture of manipulation, control, and cult-like behavior.

In this in-depth exposé, I break down how Chi Alpha operates like a multi-level marketing scheme, pressures students into performative healing, and aggressively targets international students as part of a broader mission strategy.

Whether you’ve been involved in Chi Alpha or are just curious about what really goes on, this video pulls back the curtain on the inner workings of one of America’s most powerful campus ministries.


#ChiAlpha #ReligiousTrauma #ChristianCult #CampusMinistryExposed #SpiritualManipulation

episodes.title: Inside ECKANKAR: Sleep, Soul Travel, and the Planes of Existence
episodes.description:
In this video, we explore the lesser-known beliefs of the new religious movement ECKANKAR — specifically their teachings around sleep, Soul Travel, and the spiritual planes of existence.

While these beliefs may seem mystical or harmless on the surface, we examine the psychological effects, including how dream interpretation, spiritual surveillance, and karmic framing can shape followers’ mental and emotional health.

As a former believer (or curious outsider), you’ll get an in-depth look at what it means to sleep in ECKANKAR — and why it might be more controlling than you think.

👁️ Topics covered:
– The Astral, Causal, Mental & Soul Planes
– The Mahanta’s role in dreams
– Soul Travel during sleep
– Potential mental health consequences
– How spiritual dreams can override real-life agency

🔔 Subscribe for more exvangelical commentary, cult breakdowns, and psychological deep dives into fringe spiritual movements.

#Eckankar #SpiritualSleep #SoulTravel #Exvangelical #NewReligiousMovements #DreamInterpretation #CultsExplained #MentalHealthInReligion

🎯 SEO-Rich, Ad-Friendly Title Options:

episodes.title: Exposing The Twelve Tribes: The Cult Behind The Yellow Deli and Mate Factor
episodes.description:
The Yellow Deli may look like a cozy, hippie-style café — but behind the herbal tea and hand-carved booths lies a controversial religious movement with a dark history. In this deep dive, we uncover the hidden world of the Twelve Tribes, the group behind The Yellow Deli and Mate Factor.

From alleged child labor and cult-like control to apocalyptic beliefs and communal living, this video explores the origins, beliefs, daily life, and controversies surrounding the Twelve Tribes movement.

🔍 Topics Covered:

The history and founding of the Twelve Tribes

How The Yellow Deli and Mate Factor operate

Daily life inside the community

Accusations of abuse, racism, and labor violations

Why they continue to operate in plain sight

⚠️ Viewer discretion advised: This video discusses sensitive topics including abuse and religious manipulation.

👇 Share your thoughts in the comments. Have you ever visited a Yellow Deli or Mate Factor location?

#TwelveTribes #TheYellowDeli #MateFactor #Cults #CultDeepDive #ExposingCults #ReligiousCults #InvestigativeDocumentary
